favourite.article: these songs are so wonderful and my favorite song is "i am baptized".

You will make known to me the path of life; In Your presence is fullness of joy; At Your right hand there are pleasures forever.-Psalm 16:11, Thank you for this hymn, the enjoyment led me to this verse!!!

We can use psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs to let the word of Christ richly dwell in us. In singing hymns we need to sing with grace in our hearts unto the Lord, and in whatever word or in work we need to do all in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
